message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go quite that low. How about we meet in the middle at $102?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $98 for the product.
